Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000. Given its high quality and relevance to your requirements, I believe it would be an excellent investment for you. Considering its immense value, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this exceptional deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
